pop>=14
grainsv2>=11.7
grains-universal>=2.1
grains-virt>=3

[:"BSD" in sys_platform]
idem-bsd>=4.2

[:"sunos" in sys_platform]
idem-solaris>=4.2

[:os_name == "AIX"]
idem-aix>=4.2

[:os_name == "posix"]
idem-posix>=2.3

[:sys_platform == "darwin"]
idem-darwin>=8.2

[:sys_platform == "linux"]
idem-linux>=7.2

[:sys_platform == "win32"]
idem-windows>=5.3
